entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a student who is waiting for her O.W.L. results. She is described as being agitated and checking her answers multiple times.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as a teacher who informs the students that their O.W.L. results will be sent to them via owl in July.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is mentioned as a student who comments on not having to worry about the exam results until the holidays.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who is waiting for his O.W.L. results and is imagining himself in his bedroom at Privet Drive.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is mentioned as Harry's home address where he will be waiting for his O.W.L. results.

entities.name: o.w.l.
entities.description: O.W.L. (Ordinary Wizarding Level) is mentioned as the exam that the students are waiting for their results.

entities.name: theory of charms
entities.description: Theory of Charms is mentioned as one of the subjects that the students will be taking an exam in.

entities.name: achievements in charming
entities.description: Achievements in Charming is mentioned as a book that Hermione uses to check her answers.

relationships.description: Harry will be waiting for his O.W.L. results at Privet Drive, which is mentioned as his home address.
Hermione uses Achievements in Charming to check her answers for the Theory of Charms exam.
